description: Test suite for the Message model in the kindergarten management system, verifying creation, mapping, type handling, broadcast behavior, and copying functionalities.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Model class representing a message with various properties such as id, title, content, type, sender/recipient IDs, timestamps, read and importance flags, and related methods.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point executing a group of unit tests for the Message model.
